summary:
I am a chemist by training and was awarded a Ph.D. degree with a cum laude distinction by University of Groningen for my dissertation on enzymatic synthesis of biobased polyesters and polyamides.
I am an expert in vinyl ester and polyester synthesis, with profound knowledge from Lab to pilot to production. I am passionate about the new polymer backbone design.
I have extensive experience in developing thermoset resins for fiber-reinforced polymer composites applications, for example, bonding pastes (adhesive), relining (CIPP), light-curing resins (UV/blue LED), glass and carbon fiber SMC, and flame retardancy. 
I am proficient at preparing B-stage compounds using different technologies (MgO/Urethane/Epoxy thickening). 
I also gained experience in thin organic coatings and metal pretreatment.
Besides, I actively supervise MBO/HBO/Master students for their internships in the chemical industry.

profile_positions.description:
Project leader of multiple large projects in many different applications, e.g., light curing, relining, SMC, flame retardance;
Passionate on new polymer backbone design;
profile_positions.title: R&D Scientist/Project Manger
Advanced Chemist

profile_positions.description:
PhD thesis (cum laude): Enzymatic Polymerization of Biobased Polyesters and Polyamides

(1)	Supervised by Prof. Dr. Katja Loos
       •	Working on a Dutch Polymer Institute project: Polymers Go Even Greener
       •	Established an eco-friendly synthesis approach towards sustainable polymers
       •	Synthesized various novel sustainable polymers: saturated aliphatic polyesters, unsaturated aliphatic polyesters, sugar-based polyesters, furan-based polyesters and furan-based polyamides
       •	Established structure-property relationships for sustainable polymers  

(2)	Expert in polymer science
       •	Broad knowledge of polymers: synthesis, structure, characterizations and applications
       •	Versed in ring-opening polymerization and polycondensation
       •	Mastery of enzymatic polymerization

(3)	Versed in analysis and characterization of polymer structures and properties
       •	Proficient in many chemical and instrumental analysis techniques
       •	Manipulate many instruments skillfully: NMR, IR, XRD, GPC, DSC, MALDI-ToF MS, TGA, UV-Vis, DLS, mechanical tests, etc.  

(4)	Result-oriented and productive
       •	Completed experimental work one year ahead of PhD plan
       •	Published 7 research papers: one cover paper and one back cover paper
       •	Teaching assistant for the lab course - Macromolecular Chemistry
       •	Supervised one master and one bachelor student

(5) Attended advanced vocational training and received certificates
       •	RPK-A: register polymer science, National Dutch Graduate School of Polymer Science and Technology, the Netherlands (03.2014 - 06.2014)
       •	Intercultural Leadership Program for Asian Professionals, Nyenrode Business University, the Netherlands (01.2012 - 06.2012)
       •	Presentation skills, master class of Supramolecular Materials and Systems/Applied Biocatalysis
profile_positions.title: Ph.D "cum laude" | Polymer Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Worked on thin organic coatings for galvanized steels (EG and HDG)
•	Developed and commercialized a new thin organic coating product 
•	Proficient in the synthesis of hybrid materials for coatings via sol-gel technology
•	Skilled in preparation and evaluation of coatings and metal pretreatment products 
•	Familiar with polymer resins in water-borne coatings

Worked on green surface treatment technologies for cold rolled steels and alloys
•	R&D of metal-free products
•	Familiar with many corrosion protection materials

(4)	Supervised scale-up of new products

(5)	Assisted Technical Service and Sales for customer visit
